sentences.en: A ferocious battle to select a new parliamentary candidate is in progress.
sentences.cn: 推选一位新的议会候选人的激战正酣。

sentences.en: a group of students selected at random
sentences.cn: 随机挑选出来的一组学生

sentences.en: Be sure to select firm, unblemished fruit.
sentences.cn: 一定要选坚实、无疤痕的果子。

sentences.en: Come and help me select a good place for our camp.
sentences.cn: 过来帮我选个露营的地方.

sentences.en: Honorary degrees are handed out to a select few .
sentences.cn: 荣誉学位颁给挑选出的少数几个人。

sentences.en: Select "Delete all" from the drop-down list.
sentences.cn: 在下拉列表项中选择“全部删除”。

sentences.en: She lets her son select his own Christmas present.
sentences.cn: 她让儿子自己选择圣诞礼物.

sentences.en: She was very select in people she invites.
sentences.cn: 她邀请的客人都要经过严格挑选.

sentences.en: That school is very select.
sentences.cn: 那所学校招生非常严格.

sentences.en: The book is a select collection of poetry from various authors.
sentences.cn: 这本书是各家诗作的集锦.

sentences.en: The boutique caters for a rather select clientele.
sentences.cn: 这家精品店为特定的顾客群服务.

sentences.en: The captain needs a select crew for this dangerous voyage.
sentences.cn: 船长需要一批精选的水手来作此危险的航行.

sentences.en: The floorcovering you select will need to be impervious to water.
sentences.cn: 挑选的地板材料必须是防水的。

sentences.en: The party was small and select.
sentences.cn: 团里人员不多，都是经过精心挑选的。

sentences.en: We get a drawer with our name on it and select all our meals before we go, but nothing tastes like it does on Earth.
sentences.cn: 我们在出发之前领到了一个标有我们名字的抽屉，并选择我们的餐点，但它们和在地球上的味道完全不同。

sentences.en: We have over 30 beautiful designs to select from.
sentences.cn: 我们有30多种美丽的图案可供选择.

sentences.en: Which place in the world would you select as your perfect home?
sentences.cn: 你选择世界上的什么地方作为你最理想的安家之地 呢 ?

sentences.en: With a difficult tee shot, select a club which will keep you short of the trouble.
sentences.cn: 开球难度较大时，选一根好使的高尔夫球杆。

sentences.en: You can select any one of them for testing.
sentences.cn: 您可以选择其中任何一个进行测试。

sentences.en: You may select whoever you think is suitable.
sentences.cn: 大家看谁合适就选谁.

words.tran_cn: 精选的；挑选出来的；极好的

phrases.tran_cn: 特别委员会（为某一特案组成的）

trans.tran_cn: 精选的，第一流的，高级的
trans.tran_en: a select group of people or things is a small special group that has been chosen carefully
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc

trans.tran_cn: 选择，选拔，（在计算机屏幕上）选定，
trans.tran_en: to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc
to choose something or someone by thinking carefully about which is the best, most suitable etc
